name: Student Number Memory Game
description:
This game is meant to help Atlantic University interns memorize their student number while also having a little fun! 

(You can also use it for any other 10-digit number)

How To Play

It's simple, you type your student number at the beginning, then when the game starts, you'll have to type it again before you get overwhelmed by the enemy projectiles. If you succeed, you'll turn blue and be able to shoot lightning! You're invincible now so just kill the enemies and repeat the process in the next level.  Beat the boss at the end to win!

Controls:

Move = WASD

Reset Number = Backspace

When powered up:

Shoot = Left Mouse Button (hold)

Made in a few hours with Gamemaker Lite
